title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly
descriptions:
Introducing the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping - your ultimate solution for a comfortable and rejuvenating sleep experience. This set of 2 hotel-quality pillows is designed to cater to all types of sleepers, be it back, stomach, or side sleepers.

Filled with plush hollow fibers, these pillows offer a luxurious down alternative microfiber filling that provides optimal support and comfort. The pillow's no-shift construction ensures that the filling stays evenly distributed, providing consistent support throughout the night.

The COZSINOOR pillows are not just comfortable, but also skin-friendly and breathable. The polyester blend cover material is gentle on your skin, while the breathable design ensures that you stay cool and comfortable all night long.

One of the standout features of these pillows is their cooling property. The cooling bed pillows are designed to dissipate heat, ensuring that you never wake up feeling too warm or sweaty.

Experience the luxury of hotel-quality sleep with the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping. Order yours today and wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated every morning.
